Per build, about 15 such staces are printed to the log. This takes 10 seconds 
for every build. My observations:
- I do only single file changes, so I wounder why the PDE builder is doing some 
work
- I have pde as binary plugin in my workspace. So I'm surprised that schemas 
are searched in the development drop (D:\devel\sdk30122
\eclipse\plugins\org.eclipse.pde.ui_2.1.0...). All plugins from 
the 'application location' are disabled.

The error should not produce a log, but is an indication of an attempt to open 
a schema file that does not exist. This is due to the fact that platform UI had 
a bunch of typos in their plugin.xml (refering to a non-existent schema file). 
This should be fixed in the new I build. We will stop producing these logs.
The errors should go away now (in builds > M5).

We are not producing these logs any more - just not validating if we cannot 
find schema.
